entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
